thing-type.label: TZWP-102 Telldus socket and energy meter
thing-type.description: Telldus socket and energy meter<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTelldus Z-Wave Plug-in Switch Mini, small size, clean design with energy metering and overcurrent protection. With its small size and clean design, it fits into your home interior design very well also it is possible to use two devices side by side in most electrical outlets. LED indicator can be turned off to not disturb in dark rooms. Control lighting, chargers and other electronic equipment up to 2300 W (resistive load).</p&gt <p&gtWith energy consumption measuring you don’t only see the actual consumption, it can also help to find out if your connected device is ok or not or turn off the mobile charger when the mobile phone is fully charged for safe operation.</p&gt <p&gtThe device acts as a repeater for the Z-Wave network. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt<strong&gtAutomatically add device to network</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtWhen the device is inserted into an electrical outlet it’s in automatic add mode (Network Wide Inclusion, NWI). This means that the device is added automatically when the Z-Wave controller enters add mode.</p&gt <p&gt<strong&gtManually add device to network</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gtStart the add mode on the Z-Wave controller. Press the button on the device three times fast. The device will now be added into the Z-Wave network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtStart the exclusion mode on the Z-Wave controller. Press the button on the device three times fast. The device will now be removed from the Z-Wave network. </p&gt
